Text: I could be wrong, but I don't think this has English audio. Just thought I'd give you a "heads-up" on this if you're thinking about downloading it. Can anyone confirm they have English audio on their download? Anyways, thanks for the effort.

Just thought I'd add this, I believe the Spoken languages are: German, Russian. (The Russian dub is poorly done, the German audio can still be heard and at times drowns out the Russian dub. It's like having two people talk at once.) Does anyone else have this problem?

For mysacrifice4freedom: No English subs in video. Download here:  'http://www.opensubtitles.net/en/movie-subtitles-searcher.suhoga/3658929' . To listen in original german, Choose Audio Stream No.:2 (instead of Stream 1). Video quality not very good.

@Mysacrifice: this is how they dub movies in Russian, it's terrible! In this case, at least they left the original audio (German, it's originally a German movie) intact in a separate audio stream, often enough they simply overdub in Russian and destroy the original audio.
